body: Dustin, The bug I fixed was in Ladybug_Ladybug and had to do wit the function that creates the legend for all of the other components that use legends. When I flip the surface in your file, I get zero radiation: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/6Tyx6FS0AhePPc5NIf9KcJlKIFk5tjIGRRiSaWGv9DUpLds7VutCkZveOI923SSudT5Xu9iVpyPVF1oX9HulrOn3Ii7nydqF/ZeroRad.PNG) You must be doing something wrong.  Maybe make sure that the surface is flipped in grasshopper instead of Rhino. -Chris
